title: VivereVeg
description: A vegan organic store carries foods such as cheese, vegetables, tofu, seitan, tempeh, yogurt, burgers, nuggets, sausages, meatballs, cookies and other baked goods, pasta, flour, rice, cereals, legumes, nuts, seeds, spices, herbal and non-herbal teas, cosmetics and many other products, including cruelty free detergents.
